actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-1161.

official_title: An amendment relating to the printing of legislative proceedings with respect to the death of former Senator Karl E. Mundt.

summary.text: Provides that the legislative proceedings in the United States Congress relating to the death of the former Senator from South Dakota, Mr. Mundt, be printed as a Senate document.

titles.title: An amendment relating to the printing of legislative proceedings with respect to the death of former Senator Karl E. Mundt.
